Entries.64780023/e 64780011/n Pregnant1_Sebastia: sappypiano/-100 -100/farmer 19 12 2 Sebastian 20 12 2 Harvey 5 15 2/addConversationTopic Sebastian_BabySleep 14/skippable/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Is everything okay babe? It looks like you- $s #$b# OH! Is the baby coming?!$l"/changeLocation Hospital/showFrame 5/ambientLight 150 150 150/viewport 14 14 true/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Are you comfortable?#$b#Or at least as comfortable as you can be?$4"/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/emote farmer 60/emote Sebastian 28/pause 500/speak Sebastian "I wish I could do more for you. $s"/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 1 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "I've never said it before, @. But I'm really proud of you."/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 -1 3/speak Sebastian "And I'm so glad you wanted to start a family with me. $l"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Just let me know when the time comes, and I'll hold your hand. We'll go through this together babe."/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Sebastian "I made a promise to myself when I married you that I would always be there during your time of need. #$b# And that time is now..."/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100 true/warp Harvey 21 12/faceDirection Harvey 3/warp Sebastian 20 11/faceDirection Sebastian 2/speak Sebastian "Is it time? The baby's coming?$2#$b#I'll get Harvey. You know what to do, babe."/pause 1500/speak Harvey "That's it @. Just one more push!"/addTemporaryActor Baby 23 15 20 12 2 False Character/positionOffset Baby 0 -50/pause 500/message "Your baby's cry pierces the air."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, your baby's lungs are certainly strong and healthy!$h"/fade/viewport 12 14 true/pause 500/emote Sebastian 20/pause 2000/speak Sebastian "Oh @. %kid1 is perfect. Just like you.$l"/emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 1500/viewport -100 -100 true/message "Your family just got a little bigger! Time to take your new baby home!"/pause 1000/end

Entries.64780024/e 64780012/n Pregnant1_Elliott/: sappypiano/-100 -100/farmer 19 12 2 Elliott 20 12 2 Harvey 5 15 2/addConversationTopic Elliott_BabySleep 14/skippable/pause 500/speak Elliott "Is everything okay, darling? $s #$b# Oh my! Entries.64780029: sappypiano/-100 -100/Leah 19 12 2 farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 5 15 2/addConversationTopic Leah_BabySleep 14/skippable/pause 500/speak Leah"@ - are you awake? #$b# I think the baby is coming!$4"/changeLocation Hospital/showFrame 5/ambientLight 150 150 150/viewport 14 14 true/pause 1000/speak Leah "I'm okay dear, really."/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/emote Leah 20/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Leah "Don't worry too much about me. $h #$b# Childbirth is a natural occurence! I probably could have even done it at home."/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/speak Leah"Thank you for taking me to the clinic, though. #$b# To be completely honest, I am a little nervous. $2"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 3/speak Leah "But I'm glad that you're here with me.$l"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Leah"And I thank Yoba every day that you chose to marry me instead of one of those other girls! $h #$b# And I'm looking forward to raising a family with you on %farm."/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Leah "I have a feeling that we'll even be decent parents! $h"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100 true/warp Harvey 21 12/faceDirection Harvey 3/warp farmer 20 11/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Harvey "It's time for the baby to come, @. Leah is going to need to start pushing now."/pause 1500/speak Harvey "That's it, Leah! Just one more push!"/addTemporaryActor Baby 23 15 20 12 2 False Character/positionOffset Baby 0 -50/pause 500/message "Your baby's cry pierces the air."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, your baby's lungs are certainly strong and healthy!$h"/fade/viewport 12 14 true/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 2000/speak Leah "Oh @. %kid1 is perfect. Just like you.$l"/emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 1500/viewport -100 -100 true/message "Your family just got a little bigger! Time to take your new baby home!"/pause 1000/end

Entries.FarmerPregnantSebastian: I promise that I'll be a better father than my dad was... #$b# Hey, at least it'll be easy to do, right? $h

Entries.FarmerPregnantAlex: If we have a girl, do you think we could name her Clara? #$b# I think my mom would have really liked that. $h

Entries.PennyPregnant: I can't wait to tell my mom about the good news!$h #$b# I just hope she takes it well...

Entries.HarveyPregnant: Make sure that you don't drink any alcohol during your pregnancy. #$b# I just don't want our baby to have any health concerns later in life.$s

Entries.MaruPregnant: I can't wait to tell my mom and dad about the good news!$h#$b# I guess I can tell Sebastian too, but I don't think he'd really care.$s

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Maru told me that she wants to be my mid-wife.#$b#I think I'd be a little more comfortable having her with me to deliver the baby.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: I've been thinking about names for the baby. #$b# What do you think of %name?
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I think our child will be delighted to grow up on %farm.  #$b#There are so many wonderful things to do here!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I hope Jas and Vincent will get along with the baby. #$b# They're kind of used to being the youngest one's in town.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Remember that our baby will need to sleep for a while after they're born. #$b# I'm already picking out some fairytales to read to them in their crib. $l
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I'll have to get used to waking up in the middle of the night to feed the baby... $s #$b# I'm sure it will be worth it, though! $h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: This is going to be one of our last peaceful nights before the baby arrives...$s #$b# Oh don't get me wrong - I'm excited! But I do enjoy our peace and quiet.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I used to hang out with Sam before we got married. #$b# It's a little strange to think that our lives are so different now.#$b# Don't worry - I don't regret marrying you at all!$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Oooh the baby's kicking!$h #$b# Do you want to feel it?
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: The other day Jas and Vincent started asking me where babies come from...#$b# I told them that they should ask their parents in a few years.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Just think - we'll be parents soon!$h #$b# The thought is a little scary, but I think we're ready for it.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I hope our child enjoys the rain as much as I do. $h
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Water often symbolizes rebirth in literature... #$b# Maybe this rain is a sign that our baby will be born healthy!$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Caroline gave me some tea yesterday that she says will help with my morning sickness.#$b# I'm so glad to have so much support for my first pregnancy.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I've been craving melon recently. #$b# Do you think you could pick me up some at Pierre's?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Do you want to cuddle tonight like we used to?$l #$b# Even though I'm pregnant, you know you're still allowed to touch me.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Do you think the baby can hear the rain? #$b# I've always loved the sound of raindrops hitting the roof.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I think I might go to bed early tonight. #$b# Who knew being pregnant would be so exhausting?$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: You'll be there to hold my hand when I have the baby, right? #$b# I couldn't imagine going through that without you.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Have you thought about having another child after this one arrives? #$b# I'm not trying to give you any ideas!$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: I hope that when the baby is here, I can still watch you work out here. #$b# What? You're extra cute when you work! #l
Entries.Outdoor_1: Isn't this a perfect place to raise children?#$e#I would've been so happy growing up on a farm.
Entries.Outdoor_2: Oh! The baby's kicking!$h #$b# It  must like the sunshine.
Entries.Outdoor_3: What do you think about the name Sunny, if we have a girl? #$b# I guess the nice weather inspired me a little. $h
Entries.Outdoor_4: Jodi told me that she rubbed Truffle Oil on her belly when she was pregnant with Vincent to get rid of her stretch marks. #$b# Do we have any lying around? I'd like to try it.
Entries.spouseRoom_Penny: I just read that {Random:Tom Kah Soup, Roots Platter, Red Plate} can help with nausea during pregnancy. #$b#I wonder if Gus could make me some...
Entries.funLeave_Penny: I have an appointment with Dr. Harvey today! #$b# I wonder how big the baby is now! $h
Entries.funReturn_Penny: Dr. Harvey said our baby is as big as a {Random:gridball, loaf of bread, melon}!$h
Entries.jobLeave_Penny: #$c .5#Well I'm off to teach Jas and Vincent! Hopefully they don't ask me where babies come from again...#I'm off to work! I might swing by the clinic later to talk to Dr. Harvey about the baby.$h#I'm heading out to teach Jas and Vincent. I'll let you know if they come up with any interesting names for the baby!$h
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: Jas and Vincent think that we should name the baby %name. What do you think?#I hope our child listens to me more than Jas and Vincent do.... Today was a little rough.#Dr. Harvey says that as long as I get plenty of exercise that the baby will be fine!$h#Dr. Harvey says that as long as I eat lots of vegetables the baby will be fine! Do we have any veggies in the garden?
Entries.Patio_Penny: Sorry I can't really help you around on the farm anymore. $s #$b# I miss helping you, but I've gotten so big that it's much harder to do!
Entries.spring_8: It just feels right to be pregnant in the springtime. #$b# Everything is growing, and so am I! $h
Entries.spring_15: I usually love spring cleaning, but this year I'm too big to do much of it. $s
Entries.winter_3: Should I be worried about our finances, dear? With the baby coming and all? #$b# No? Oh well that's good to hear. $h

Entries.spouseRoom_Penny: I hope I'll still have time to read when the baby is here.
Entries.Outdoor_Penny: I'm trying to spend some more time outside before the baby arrives. #$b# Once it's here, I'll probably be stuck inside for a while.$s
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining - make sure you don't catch a cold, dear. #$b# I need you healthy and strong when the baby is here!$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: It's raining! That means you don't have to water the crops today!$h #$b# With all of that extra time, you could come with me to the clinic for my doctor's appointment. #$b# I wonder how big the baby is now.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: The sound of the rain woke me up. #$b# I think the baby likes the sound, they've been kicking ever since I got out of bed. $h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: What's on the agenda today, dear?#$b#I don't want to go outside and catch a cold. I want to be healthy when the baby comes.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Could you pick up something from the saloon for me tonight? #$b# I've been craving pizza!
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I'm cold. Could you add some wood to the fire?
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I think the baby likes the sound of the rain pattering on the roof. $h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I hope the sound of the rain soothes the baby tonight. #$b# They didn't stop kicking me last night until three in the morning. $s
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I hope it stops raining soon. #$b# When the baby is here, I want them to get lots of sunshine. $h
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: My mom brought some soup by earlier. [199 218 219 727 730] #$b# It's funny how she's been so much nicer to me now that I'm pregnant....
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.

Entries.BirthMessage_PlayerMother: What's wrong? The baby's coming?! We'd better get you to the hospital!
Entries.BirthMessage_PlayerFather: The baby is coming! You'd better bring your wife to the hospital!
Entries.BabyNamingTitle_Male: What should we name him, if it's a boy?
Entries.BabyNamingTitle_Female: What will we name her, if it's a girl?
